content: It doesn't surprise me that there may be something natural that beats down that bug. There is too much dependency on "doctors" and their drugs. Me? ..yuppers, i'm a still living and healthy example... So far, so good: no docs nor meds. It's not happenchance. I too, like so many of you, have suffered in (to grow strength from) shifts of crap. FWIW, i am 60 and still have no eye prescription required for driving a vehicle. The Art Of Life Is Balance. --erl
